articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Google quietly released an app that lets you download and run AI models locally - TechCrunch
articles.description: Last week, Google quietly released an app, Google AI Edge Gallery, that lets users run a range of openly available AI models from the AI dev platform Hugging Face on their phones.
articles.content:
Last week, Google quietly released an app that lets users run a range of openly available AI models from the AI dev platform Hugging Face on their phones.
